name: Skrelp
description: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.  This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.
